Articles.Content: So I was messing with the aero values in the debug menu to see what would happen but I forgot what the original values were. Is there a way to reset all the stuff you did in the debug menu? Or someone could just tell me the values.

Hi there, long time lurker, first time poster.

I am having the same issue. I messed with the thermal settings, and now I don't remember what they were before I changed them. If anyone has a link to share with the default values they could share, I'd appreciate it. THanks!
Deleting your physics.cfg and restarting the game will do it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Thank you for the quick response! Is there a post somewhere stating what the default values are? Just for reference sake?
Not that I remember, but once KSP makes a new file you'll have all the defaults, just copy it to make a backup.
